scripts.build: npm -w packages/tape-core run build && npm -w packages/tape-cli run build && npm -w packages/tape-web run build
scripts.test: npm -w packages/tape-cli run ingest -- ../../docs && npm -w packages/tape-cli run query -- "test query" && npm -w packages/tape-cli run export -- ../../packages/tape-web/public/export.json
scripts.test:full: npm run test && npm -w packages/tape-cli run glyph-train -- ../../docs --max-glyphs 5 && npm -w packages/tape-cli run bitmap -- --build --stats
